ygData.subject: Tinkering Cap NOT lifted
ygData.msgSnippet: Logalog, It was not fixed in the last patch.  On Monday, I hit 100 in tinkering, then tried 50 attempts on stalking probes without a single increase.  Prior to
ygData.messageBody:
Logalog,

It was not fixed in the last patch. On Monday, I hit 100 in tinkering, then tried 50 attempts on stalking probes without a single increase. Prior to this, the worst number of attempts I ever
had for a point increase was 22 (INT 164). Once I hit 50, I decided to /petition a guide to see if the cap had been lifted. The response I received was that tinkering wasn't touched in the last
patch *sighs*. So, now I'm trying to powerlevel through 35 so that I can do aqualungs.

Gnish, Mage of Death
Excellent Tinkerer, ONE freakin point from Master
Bristlebane
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I just read that the patch that was supposed to be this morning was actually
already done. They did it when the servers were down with that Cerfnet and
UUnet trouble. Anyway, I was wondering if anyone has tried the tinkering
skill since the patch to see if the skill cap (I think it was (Level - 15) x
5) has been fixed yet. I had been hoping that they would fix it in this
patch after someone reported that a GM said they should be fixing it soon,
maybe even in the next patch. If anyone knows if you can Tinker outside the
level cap now please say so =)

Logalog,
Veeshan Server
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
